scripts.getList: async function n(e,t,a){console.log(`Retrieving manga list for page ${e}, genre: ${t}, status: ${a}`)}var r=n;export{r as default};
scripts.getChapter: async function a(e,t){console.log(`Retrieving chapter ${t.id} for manga ${e.title}`)}var r=a;export{r as default};
scripts.getMangas: async function a(n){console.log(`Retrieving mangas for IDs: ${n.join(", ")}`)}var o=a;export{o as default};
scripts.search: async function o(a,n){console.log(`Searching for manga with query: ${a} on page: ${n}`)}var r=o;export{r as default};
scripts.isOnline: async function n(){console.log("Checking if the plugin source is online")}var e=n;export{e as default};
scripts.getDetailedManga: async function e(a){console.log(`Retrieving detailed information for manga with ID: ${a}`)}var i=e;export{i as default};
scripts.getSuggestion: async function g(e){console.log(`Retrieving suggestions for query: ${e}`)}var n=g;export{n as default};
scripts.getImage: async function g(e){console.log(`Retrieving image from URL: ${e}`)}var i=g;export{i as default};
